mapper.insert: insert into shop.items(item_name, price,delivery_option, display_option, stock, manufacturer, description, img_src) values (#{itemName}, #{price}, #{deliveryOption}, #{displayOption}, #{stock}, #{manufacturer}, #{description}, #{imgSrc})
mapper.select: select R.RNUM , R.* from ( select T.* , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM from shop.items T , (select @ROWNUM :=0 ) A order by T.item_sn desc ) R where R.RNUM between ${((pageIndex-1) * pageCount) + 1} and ${((pageIndex-1) * pageCount) + pageCount }
